events.message: I received my order but noticed I was charged twice for the same item. I want a refund for the extra payment as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized as a refund case based on the customer's message requesting money back due to double charge.
The case was assigned to agent Maria Lopez in the financial support team to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out about the double charge. I'm here to help you resolve this issue quickly.
Can you please provide the order number and the payment method used so I can verify the transactions on our end?
Sure, the order number is 4578392 and I paid using my credit card ending in 1234. Please check and confirm.
I verified the double charge and have initiated a full refund for the duplicate payment. It should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thank you very much for the prompt response and refund initiation. I appreciate the quick help!
The refund process has been completed successfully from our side. Please contact us if you do not see the refund after the given timeframe.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and that everything is now resolved satisfactorily.
Since there are no further issues reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us!
